title: Add Google AdSense script tag to HTML head

requirements.summary: Add the Google AdSense script tag inside the <head> element of frontend/index.html to enable AdSense across all pages of the React SPA
acceptanceCriteria: The AdSense <script> tag with client=ca-pub-2965680356233756 is present inside <head> in frontend/index.html.
The script tag includes both the async attribute and crossorigin="anonymous" attribute.
No existing head content (meta tags, title, other scripts) is removed or altered.
The app still loads and renders correctly after the change.

file_operations.description: Insert the Google AdSense script tag <script async src="https://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js?client=ca-pub-2965680356233756" crossorigin="anonymous"></script> inside the <head> element. Place it after any existing meta tags and before the closing </head> tag. Ensure the async and crossorigin attributes are included exactly as specified. Do not modify or remove any existing head content.
